Talk01:
Though it took all we were able to give,<sp:5:0:0>
we succeeded in imprisoning the
Demon King.
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0d01>Yes. You will recall how the Master Sword
vanished from your hand at the Temple
of Time.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Determination_00>That is when Zelda came to me, bearing
a decayed and broken sword.
Talk03:
From there, it traveled into the distant
past, appearing in Zelda's hands.
Talk04:
But I was wounded in the process.<sp:5:0:0>
My body was soon to expire.
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:TalkPositive_01>You know this tragedy as the
Imprisoning War.
Talk05:
From there, it traveled into the distant
past, appearing in Zelda's hands.<sp:0:4:0>And now, you hold it once again.
